notes.photography_style: All food photography should show flame-grill char marks, warm lighting, appetizing composition. Avoid generic stock food images. People photography should feature authentic Indian customers/families, diverse ages, genuine emotions. Avoid overly staged or stock-photo feel.
notes.india_localization: Ensure lifestyle photography features Indian people, settings, and context. Vegetarian options must be photographed with same quality and appeal as chicken items.
notes.stock_photo_sources: If using stock photos as placeholders: Unsplash, Pexels for food/restaurant scenes. Prioritize authentic, non-generic imagery. Budget for custom photography shoot for hero items and key lifestyle scenes.
notes.video_needs: Consider video for: flame-grill process (20-30 sec), brand story animation (1-2 min), customer testimonials (15-30 sec each).
